file_content.text: Father. They've come.
I already know.
Top-off and weapons check. Let's keep this quick.
This won't be a long stop, but we should restock whatever supplies we can.
I'll make sure Forex doesn't realize who we're docked with. He might start getting creative.
Major.
Captain.
Darth Marr awaits you on the bridge. I trust you remember the way?
Master Jedi.
Has Marr really found the Sith Emperor all the way out here?
His message sounded urgent.
Everyone seems to be working together well.
Everybody getting along?
Too wrapped up in his meditations to greet me himself?
Not very polite of him.
Too busy sniffing for our target to greet me himself?
Not very polite of him.
I'm certain my lord will be pleased that you're so eager to see him.
Imperials never lack certainty.
Welcome aboard.
This shouldn't take very long. Can you see about refueling while we're here?
Keep the engine humming. We don't want to overstay our welcome.
I'll be back shortly. Have Marr's crew service the Fury in the meantime.
This won't take long. Have the ship refueled and ready for departure upon my return.
I'll be back in a minute--see if you can't bum some fuel and ammo off the crew here.
See that the ship is refueled, would you? I don't plan to stay long.
I'll second that. Boarding an Imperial destroyer on purpose--with an invitation--weirds me out.
I'll check the ammo stores while I'm at it. I'll bet they've got some fun toys to spare.
Commander.
Captain.
Lord Wrath.
Darth Occlus.
Darth Nox.
Darth Imperius.
Champion.
No problem. Your Council buddies usually take good care of us.
You got it. We'll be ready to fly as soon as you're back.
Fuel, food, and fun, coming right up.
Affirmative. I really never expected to be bumming fuel off a member of the Dark Council.
Your name usually gets us pretty fast service. Shouldn't be a problem.
I wouldn't presume to speak for Lord Marr. But I've never known him to exaggerate.
We have a few veterans from Yavin to set the example. And Lord Marr's orders on the matter have been quite clear.
Have the Republic troops given you any trouble?
Everybody getting along?
A few minor scuffles, no more. Darth Marr gave us orders--strange or not, we will obey.
Our mission is clear to all of us. We know how much is at stake.
That will be all.
I can take it from here.
Welcome aboard.
Just... be sure to remember whose ship we're on. "Truce" doesn't mean we can't keep our eyes open.
I'll keep an eye on whoever gets it for us--can't be too careful.
That said... I'll be keeping my weapons handy. Whatever happens, we'll be ready.
We'll be ready to go at the drop of a hat.
I won't let any of those Republic tagalongs sniff around either. Can't be too careful.
These oh-so-friendly Republic "allies", though... them, I'll keep an eye on.
Who knows... might even find us a fresh bounty in the meantime. Could be all kinds of crooks hiding out here in the middle of nowhere.
Works for me. Free fuel is the best kind.
